p: A decrease in chick growth rate (mass gained per day) was observed when SIC increased (n = 252, R² = 0.03, p = 0.007, y = −0.037x + 6.79, Fig. 7b). Chick growth rate decreased when summer Hg increased (n = 165, R² = 0.03, p = 0.02, y = −0.66x + 7.2, Fig. 7c) and chick growth rate tended to decrease over time (n = 252, R² = 0.02, p = 0.052, y = 103–0.05x).
